frontmatter.description: If surveillance technology has been proven to be biased and racist, what are some approaches to dismantling the global surveillance apparatus that supports its creation?
frontmatter.title: Approaches to Dismantling the Global Surveillance Infrastructure

frontmatter.description: An abolitionist society is one rooted in providing for and supporting the self-determination of communities instead of capital
frontmatter.title: Notes on Policing the Planet - Part 1
